game.name: Secrets of Temple Isle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Unearth the Secrets of Temple Isle, a story driven action RPG of mystery and rebellion. As a daring treasure hunter, explore ancient ruins, master tactical combat, and lead a local resistance against a ruthless invading army. Discover lost powers and become the island’s legendary hero.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Unearth the Secrets of Temple Isle, a story driven action RPG of mystery and rebellion. As a daring treasure hunter, explore ancient ruins, master tactical combat, and lead a local resistance against a ruthless invading army. Discover lost powers and become the island’s legendary hero.
